'''Blank Score''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Underwater Nocturne}}. It is consumed during the same quest, being used to unlock the mural challenge in the [[Faded Castle]].

After the player completes the mural challenge, the second score for the [[Ancient Autoharmonic Music Box]], "Tuba Mirim," is unlocked.
